title: Starrett Diamond Grit Hole Saw - Ideal for Drilling Small Diameter Holes - 7/8" Diameter, 1-5/8" Cutting Depth, 1/2-20 Thread Size, XA1 Arbor, Silver - â€ŽKD0078-N
features: Best Choice - The hole saw is engineered for drilling small diameter holes in many non-metallic materials. When you need to make a precise cut in a hurry, this diamond grit hole saw is the ideal solution in the toughest of cutting situations.

Smooth Surface Finish - When cutting glass and porcelain, a smooth surface finish is key! This is why our hole saws are the perfect choice. The diamond grit provides a superior finish, ensuring that your installation looks great.
Outstanding Performance - Kitchen and bathroom installations can be tricky, but with our hole saws it's easy! They're small in diameter, making them perfect for those hard to reach places.
Superior Quality and Durability - Manufactured to the highest standards, these hole saws are built to last. With diamond grit construction, they can handle even the most challenging cutting tasks.

Easy to Use - With our carbide tipped pilot drill, you can be assured of quick and easy starts with every hole. It is supported by a comprehensive range of drive arbors with carbide tipped pilot drills.
description: The Starrett's high performance hole saws for drilling small diameter holes in many non-metallics. These Diamond hole saws are the ideal solution for the toughest cutting situations. Able to cut rapidly through porcelain, glass, ceramics, brick and stone, these hole saws are the ideal solution in the toughest of cutting situations. Small diameter hole saws are perfect for kitchen and bathroom installations and smooth surface finish, ideal when cutting glass and porcelain. Supported by a comprehensive range of drive arbors with carbide tipped pilot drills.
